ctx: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x, y, z : list (Term A n) H1 : reduceplus Q x y H : olist (A:=A) ltM x H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) x H3 : reduceplus Q y z Unable to unify "reduceplus Q y z" with "reduceplus Q x z".

ctx: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x, y, z : list (Term A n) H1 : reduceplus Q x y H : olist (A:=A) ltM x H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) x H3 : reduceplus Q y z Unable to unify "reduceplus Q x y" with "reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y".

ctx: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3. induction H2. - apply H3. - apply Rstar_n with y. + apply H1. + apply IHreduceplus. apply H3.
